mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards (title, content, user_id, created_at, view_count) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{author.id}, NOW(), #{viewCount})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, b.created_at, b.view_count, u.id as user_id, u.username, u.name, u.role FROM boards b LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{id}

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, b.created_at, b.view_count, u.id as user_id, u.username, u.name, u.role FROM boards b LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id ORDER BY b.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
